tr1: Number of 'hot' indicators in the content such as: entering a system directory, creating programs and executing programs
tr3: Login Status: 1 if successfully logged in; 0 otherwise
tr5: 1 if root shell is obtained; 0 otherwise
tr6: 1 if ``su root`` command attempted or used; 0 otherwise
tr7: Number of ``root`` accesses or number of operations performed as a root in the connection
tr8: Number of file creation operations in the connection
tr10: Number of operations on access control files
tr11: Number of outbound commands in an ftp session
tr12: 1 if the login belongs to the ``hot`` list i.e., root or admin; 0 otherwise
tr13: 1 if the login is a ``guest`` login; 0 otherwise
